content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Zubat, hands down. I've spent *way* too many hours under Mt. Moon and in Rock Tunnel just getting swarmed endlessly by zubats. I captured one and evolved them into a golbat and then I disliked them a bit less, but I'm still really not crazy about them.

Did / do you have a main pokemon you can't stop using? I had a really hard time using anything other than my blastoise, I loved that little dude.
